revised_title: The Croonian Lecture: On the Structure of the Stylasterid, a Family of the Hydroid Stony Corals
tldr: The author examines the structure of the stylasterid family of hydroid stony corals and concludes that they belong to the Hydroida order rather than Anthozoa. The study provides insights into the anatomy and reproductive structures of these corals, which were previously misclassified as Anthozoans.
